The two ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œcomebackÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ albums ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œDactylis GlomerataÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ and ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œFrom The 13th SunÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ were recorded with different vocalists and saw the band experimenting with new moods and styles. Marcolin returned for the self-titled, massive ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œCandlemassÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ album which marked the band`s debut with Nuclear Blast. This opus embraced both a heavy, modern sound and the timeless CANDLEMASS trademarks that has won legions of fans since the bands early days in the mid eighties.
